segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, starting with the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing everywhere, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, foot in the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How gross, she must be getting water on her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up, probably not even clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading like some nasty spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing for cookies like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is dirty from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the jar, who knows if it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, probably dropping crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden view can't hide the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so careless and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR
